string-array.name: help_desc
string-array.item:
Welcome to Trip Planner!
 Trip Planner is an organizational tool used to help keep track of destinations on your trip.
 Trip Planner can tell you where you're going and how to get there.

Getting started is easy.
 On the Start screen, simply add a name, start, and end date.
 You can then add new destination and transit methods dynamically by pressing ADD.
 At anytime, you may return by pressing CANCEL or the upper left back button.
 Once finished, you may press ADD TRIP to proceed.

After setting up the trip, you may review its current progress.
 Pressing EDIT will bring you to a screen that lets you modify your current trip.
 Pressing FINISH will complete your trip.
